MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Weaver road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:56PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35PM on 13th February 2021.
